data.title: ECHO ARTISTS — echo
data.meta_description: ECHO Artists Ltd - Representing Directors of Photography, Production Designers, Editors, Costume Designers and Hair and Makeup Artists.  Contact UK Agent Ellie Cook - Tel: +44 (0) 203 567 0777; Email: ellie@echoartists.com; Website:  www.echoartists.com
